评论详情: I purchased the burgundy color with the black / silver zipper and it is really nice. I purchased the larger size to wear over other tops during the transitional months. They look great with black/grey/navy/white leggings I purchased from Amazon (Adodos)

Love this sweatshirt. True to size and color after many washes. Not sure if it shrinks after drying since I hang my clothes. Soft on the inside and keeps me warm and comfortable when I need that extra layer.

I liked these hoodies so much that I ordered them in two colors. They are super comfy, and I like that they come in bright solid colors. The only reason I give them four stars is that they are all cotton and, though listed as being slightly oversized, but when I washed them, they shrunk up quite a bit. I'd recommend sizing up one size if you want them to stay oversized.

Is is a soft sweatshirt like material. Not to hot to wear or to cold. Zipper is not only fashionable but allows for temp control and personal style preference. Bought one to try, now have all the colors. True to size, easy wash and dry. No shrinkage. Good length and room. Slightly tighter fit at waist than bust but not major.

Color was not vibrant. I was not excited when I put it on. Too loose on the hips. I ordered a large and it fit the shoulders fine. I am a slim gal. May look better on someone with a figure. I ordered the gold, which is more of a mustard. Fabric is nice, heavier for cooler climate. Zipper works well. Good price if it fit me.
bright pretty color, the decorative zipper  is super cute too.
Loved this shirt.

COMPLETELY fell apart after like 3 washes. The inner lining just fell out.  I thught they were just loose strings and cut them, then realized in daylight half of the sweatshirt was completely see through.  I wore it to work before i noticed.  Embarrassing!!!!
Love it
Two 2 is true to size. Love.

Bought 1 blue, and 1 red in size 2-x, and they are a perfect fit. Risked washing both together in cold water - no shrinking or fading. Plan to wear these either alone or layered depending on the weather.

评论概述: Decent quality but color way off
评论详情: Decent quality but the color was not like pictured. Ordered the blue and was full not vibrant. Fit was true to size though.
Runs large and color is not even close to the color shown. I am trying it in a smaller size and different color. Seems to be a nice weight and made well
NEYOUQE Womens Fall Winter Fashion Sweatshirts Quarter Zip up pullover Polo sweatshirt women casual trendy crewneck tops. Fit well, according to chart and washed well.. I would buy again.

评论详情: Very nice

The material look and feel didn't not meet my expectation. The hemline didn't hang as long and free flowing as pictured. It is a basic sweatshirt with 3/4 front zip. The quality of the sweatshirt is as expected but not as sporty looking. I ordered size large and it was loose. Boxy fit. Returned this item. I gave it 4 star for quality only.
The top was a yellow red color instead of a blue red color.
Extremely pleasantly surprised!  Fits true to size.  Super cute, falls just below the waist, very flattering.  Light weight so good for cool spring or fall evenings.
5'4", 150 lb. Size medium.  Beautiful, flattering salmon color, fits well and very comfortable.  Recommend it

评论概述: Got five wears out of it
评论详情: I loved the color and design of this top. Cute, sporty, well-made zipper. Soft fabric but looked polished enough for running errands, school drop offs, or casual work environment. Great with leggings. But …  Within five wearing the front and sleeve were so polled from friction I had to throw it away, so it cost me $6 a wear. Too expensive for me.  The rubbing from seatbeat, carrying a toddler, or a purse strap will make it pill terribly. Once that happens, it looks awful. Threw mine out yesterday. Bummed.
I freakin love this sweatshirt! I’m buying more. It’s the perfect length, not too hot, not too cold.. has a little pizzaz with the zipper. Stylish enough for work but still comfortable.
Although it’s a little big on me, I don’t think a size down would fit either. It’s comfy though and looks good with leggings. Perfect for cool spring days.

I love this sweater! So super cute and soft! Dressy but also casual! Wore for a date night and didn't feel under dressed. Thickness is perfect! Wore it playing mini golf outside with about 55 degree weather. Was a little chilly but not enough to be uncomfortable.
I found this sweatshirt to be comfortable and warm. The fit was perfect. I have had so many compliments from people!!
This was such a great purchase. The color is bright and vibrant. Very comfy

Love love love this hoodie! Very good quality material; kind of a thick nylon feel, not too thick, not too thin. I am 5'6" 150lbs and ordered XL so it would be boxy with leggings. Fits perfect and so comfy! I ordered the blue with white bottom - looks just like the picture. I wish they had black and grey. Careful... there is another seller on Amazon showing this same hoodie for much less and it is not the same at all.
This garment is a good fit.  Easy to wear.  Soft and comfortable.
Nice looking but it is not for winter warm sweatshirt.
Pretty pink. Runs small. Comfortable. Laundries well. I did hang dry since it runs small. Looks good with jeans, sweatpants or leggings.
Did not fit well - returned without problem.

I must say that I'm often hesitant to purchase clothing online. I honestly hope for the best and expect the worst. I needed this top for an out of town trip I was taking, so I took a chance. I was worried it might fade or shrink, or just be ill-fitting and I wouldn't have time to replace it. But I love it! I like a baggy fit so I ordered a size up. The sleeve length is great, the material is not too light or too heavy, and it washed perfectly. The biggest surprise was how quickly it dried after I got rained on. I couldn't be happier.
My wife love this sweater, she actually made me order another.
Finally a classy women’s sweatshirt that fits well; the arms are actually longer enough!
Bought this for my daughter for Christmas- She loved it!

评论概述: Looks like an orange garbage bag
评论详情: perfect example of "fast fashion" - except "fashion" does NOT apply. It's literally a big tube for body and tubes  for sleeves, with zipper inserted in the middle. If you want to look shapeless and uninteresting but reflective - this cheerful garbage bag is for you
Nice quality but runs a bit small

I love it, just what I was looking for.
Great price and super comfortable. Quality material.
Great weight in fabric.  Zipper is nice quality, and you adjust the open neckline.  Wonderful color

Five stars hands down.
This is exactly what I was looking for. The sweatshirt is a great weight for spring. The zipper neck sits nicely-doesnt hang or sit awkwardly.

Perfect length, perfect fit, perfect color! Perfect weight as well. A must have.

I bought the darker khaki and didn't like it, exchanged for the light Khaki and love it!

This top is so comfy.  Its not made of sweat shirt material, it's like polyester.  I went by some of the reviews and got one size up with a Large, but a Medium would have worked.  I'm still keeping mine because it's so stinking cute with leggings and boots.
Thought that this would lightweight and breathable based on description and it is not.  Too thick and does not breath at all.
It was ruined after the first wash. It picked up color from a 10 yr old pair of jeans that I didn't think could even fade anymore. I'd be very wary of washing it with anything.
Very comfortable will buy another.
This is made from great fabric and the size was as advertised. Great brand.
Love the style of this shirt but the material that was used to make it is cheap. The shirt will get easily snagged on anything. I sent it back.
Love this sweatshirt!  So comfy and cozy!
Very hard and stiff material. Save your money. I returned this shirt because of the cheap fabric!

I love everything about this sweatshirt. EXCEPT after wearing it one time it became very pill-y. Now it looks old and dingy.

Is not cute like the picture. The fabric was thin, rough and super cheap.
Love the sweatshirt, the shape and color but after wearing it and washing it once is it all pilling, too bad because its a cute sweatshirt

Fits well size large
My daughter doesn't like hooded shirts (apparently) so I claimed this as my own. I love it!  Comfy and cute.

I have this in blue and liked it so much I put the pink one on my Christmas list, which I was gifted. I am disappointed in the pink color as it doesn’t match the color shown. It’s more of a peachy/light pink. Not horrible but wish it was closer to the picture shown
This is a good looking hoodie. It fits well and the colors are beautiful. Fabric does not fade.
Love this shirt, hoodie. I bought several colors. Very comfortable, good quality, warm enough I just wear a cami under it.
Cute but way too big.

Wore this sweatshirt once-loved it! After one washing-following the directions and in cold water—the dye started washing away, here and there, subtly. Wasn’t even sure what I was seeing; but after 2nd wear and wash—again in cold—dye washed out even more. Now looks like 2-tone or tie dye! Not what I wanted!

Love the color and style of tuis hoodie. Very lightweight and comfortable.

Lots of compliments whenever I wear it. Very comfortable

Fits true to size. Comfy

Shirt that came looked nothing like the one online

I purchased this sweatshirt a little larger than my usual size in order to wear it over another top, mainly because it looks a bit thin in the pictures. I was correct about the material being a bit thin, but since the sizing runs a bit smaller, wearing it over another top makes it bulky looking. I would not call this a sweatshirt, as it is not very thick material or particularly warm, although it would work well enough in Autumn or Spring without a coat. Though the material is soft enough, it has that polyester feel to it that I'm not fond of against my skin, so I will try it out with a thin cotton undershirt and see if I like that better. If you're not particular about the feel of certain fabrics, then this top will be fine for you.

I followed the size chart indicated by the company and ordered a Large and it is a little snug. It’s a nice top but feels like polyester although it feels soft. It is on the thin side so I would want to wear a tank under it or a vest over it in the Winter to stay a bit warmer. The red color is very nice and bright and festive.
Beautiful sweatshirt. Looks like pic.  The red is more orange red it is very pretty.  I am 38ddd ordered med fit perfect.

This is a super cute, half zip sweatshirt.  The fit is perfect for me. For reference I'm 5'7 and weigh between 140 and 145lbs. I'm also a 36C. I'm tall and thin.  The sleeves are long enough for me, which is a nice surprise.  The material is good quality and the stitching is sturdy.  And, the zipper is a cute detail that really gives this top a little something extra.  This top looks cute with a white tank or tee underneath.  I wear this one shopping, running errands, visiting and going to casual restaurants.  This sweatshirt is super comfy, cute and a bit more dressy than a regular sweatshirt.  I love it and I would definitely recommend this top to my family and friends.  I hope this was helpful.

评论概述: Very Cute But Not Very Warm
评论详情: If you you're looking for something for a cool day this is for you. It's not really made for winter but it has a beautiful lacy pattern and is good over a long sleeve base layer

Ordered the burgundy and received black, it is the right size but not as soft as it looks in their photos. More like a polyester jacket. Oh well, not going to return it. Just won't buy any more from them.

I ordered this top and accidentally ordered a size too small (it does fit true to size). Other than my own mistake, I love this top! I've already ordered another in a different color (and correct size). It's nice enough to wear in a work Zoom call. It's very cute and the shaping and tailoring of it is perfect. The neck is a nice a flattering shape and it's got the slightly relaxed/slouchy look, without just being very over-sized. My husband even liked it and tried it on, saying he was going to claim it for himself (the size I got is fine if you don't have boobs), but it's still hot pink and feminine and he's not a guy that can pull that off. He still insisted in wearing it all day. People get weird after working from home for 3 years. The listing photos match the top I received perfectly.
This trendy top is cute for fall.  It's very simple and oversized.  Perfect to wear with leggings or jeans.  Would look great with a turtleneck underneath if you want to layer.
Made well. Fits to size. Overall great product

I am 5'4 174lbs and a medium fit me well. This is a well made sweatshirt and I like the zipper detail. While this fits well everywhere, it is shorter on me than what the picture shows. Good quality, lightweight fabric. I would recommend to others. Maybe size up one if you want a more oversized, cozy look.
Fits great.  Nice Material.  No complaints.

The fit is pretty spot on, but it's not soft, fuzzy & warm. Not ebay I consider a sweatshirt. It's more of just a woven top. I am also not sure if the pink is just not my color since it's not exactly the color pictured (more peach) or if it's not my style. I think it could work if it was available in better color options.

评论概述: Nice to Wear around the House
评论详情: The look and feel is what my wife expected. she needed a light sweatshirt to use around the house or a quick trip to the convenient store. It is very synthetic but feels nice. The zipper loop is a bit bigger than what she might of liked, but is of good quality. Should have gotten one size up for it to be a bit more comfy.

This is really cute and fits perfectly.  Love the color and the material is soft.  Zipper goes down low enough you can wear a cute tank or t-shirt underneath and it will show which changes up the look
Based on the size chart that was listed for this sweater, I ordered a medium but it was pretty tight. Other than that, the sweater is cute and the color is great. Machine wash & dry

I ordered by bust measurement and while this is a lovely pull over, it fits oddly. Fit is perfect for arm length and bust, but it tapers in around the waist and hips. I'm still carrying a bit of weight there so I'm not comfortable wearing this as the top layer right now, but it works perfectly under my hockey jersey for game nights. Bit nervous to wash it, and I'll update later on how it comes out of the washer/dryer. Soft, otherwise comfortable just too tight around the middle.

评论概述: Very nice looking and fits great!
评论详情: This is a high quality pullover and I really like the color.  The fit is perfect for me.  5'6"  135 lbs, size medium.Very happy with this.
This fits funny under the arms. Otherwise cute.
